alert.note: Alert for Darke; Miami; Montgomery; Preble (Ohio) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued June 01 at 6:42PM EDT by NWS Wilmington
info.description: ...A STRONG THUNDERSTORM WILL IMPACT PORTIONS OF NORTHEASTERN PREBLE, SOUTHEASTERN DARKE, NORTHWESTERN MONTGOMERY AND SOUTHWESTERN MIAMI COUNTIES THROUGH 715 PM EDT... At 642 PM EDT, a strong thunderstorm was located over Lewisburg, moving east at 35 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 45 mph, half inch hail, and frequent cloud-to-ground lightning. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Hail may cause minor damage to outdoor objects. Lightning can cause serious injury or death. Locations impacted include... Dayton, Huber Heights, Troy, Trotwood, Vandalia, Englewood, Tipp City, Eaton, West Milton, Lewisburg, Clayton, Union, Brookville, Phillipsburg, Verona, West Manchester, Laura, Potsdam, Gordon and Ludlow Falls. This includes the following Interstates... I-70 in Ohio between mile markers 10 and 34. I-75 in Ohio between mile markers 62 and 75. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.50 IN MAX WIND GUST...45 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a sturdy building. When thunder roars, go indoors! Do not stay in the open or seek shelter under trees when lightning threatens. To report hazardous weather conditions, go to our website at weather.gov/iln and submit your report via social media, when you can do so safely.
